full_summary:
================
# Cancelled Government Tender: NR22SLNO

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01018158
* **Solicitation Number**: NR22SLNO
* **Publication Date**: December 21, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: Cancelled (Originally: March 31, 2026, 2:00 PM)
* **Procurement Category**: Construction
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Scope of Work

The tender was related to the construction of various building types, including one and two dwelling buildings, multi-dwelling buildings, warehouses and industrial buildings, commercial buildings, health buildings, and other structures.

### Important Notice

Please note that this tender notice has been cancelled. No further action will be taken, and no tenders will be accepted.

### Procurement Method

The procurement method was competitive, open bidding.

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Defence Construction Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K3, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Mark Smith
* **Contact Email**: mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: 613-859-0549

### Additional Information

No attachments or additional documentation are available for this cancelled tender notice. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Mark Smith at the provided email or phone number.

---
